entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
